title: Ribbon, 19th century
medium:
Medium: Silk.  
Technique: brocaded on plain cloth.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: The width is composed of three ribbons sewn together.  The broader central ribbon is dull red and has vertical stripes in blue, white, and yellow and green foliage repeated vertically.  The narrow ribbons on either side are a brighter red and have flowers and foliage in purple, green, and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
